_header: Of Our Lady Mary beginneth now Her the plaint
_description: Verse introduction and conclusion to ME prose narration of the Passion — two couplets

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Of oure lefdy Marie bigynneþ now here þe pleyntþat of
                    þe passion of hir son sche tolde with hert feynt
CamMagPep2498.Note:
Note that found on p. 449, not 459 as in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943.
